name: update-post-repo
description: A repo to post updates to the app list
author: Maxime Le Besnerais

apps.name: Updater
apps.description: An app that uses a github repo as a store. It can be used to update the app itself or other apps.
apps.changelog: 1.0.3 - Better support for errors, added a new error screen.
apps.author: Maxime Le Besnerais
